name: FLEX Boost
details:
The Mooer Flex Boost is just that. A flexible boost pedal that can even double as an overdrive. It has a wide range of gain tones and can really thicken up your sound. Its full metal casing makes it durable and road ready, and like most great effects pedals it has true bypass.
Wide range gain boost
Enough gain to work well as an overdrive
Full metal shell
Pedalboard friendly
True bypass

Input: 1/4" monaural jack (impedance: 1M Ohms)
Output: 1/4" monaural jack (impedance: 10k Ohms)
Power Requirements: AC adapter 9V DC (center minus plug)
Current Draw: 6 mA
Dimensions: 1.6535" (W) x 2.0472" (H) x 3.6811" (D)
Weight: 0.36lb
